user.title: Connect to Luna-U
user.description: Enter connection details for your Luna-U device.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Luna-U

init.title: Luna-U Configuration (Step 1 of 2)
init.description:
Configure zone, input, and GPIO counts. Each zone will be created as a separate device. All GPIOs will be grouped under a single 'GPIO Outputs' device.

Click Submit to continue to input naming.

input_names.title: Input Names (Step 2 of 2)
input_names.description: Name your inputs. These names will appear as source options when selecting inputs for zones.
